article.title: Illinois U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the Illinois U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​​​Take the first step into finding new markets! Contact your local Trade Specialist in your area whocovers your industry and canhelpincrease your export sales.​


ChicagoU.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information

200 West Adams Street, Suite 2450
Chicago, IL 60606
Phone: 312-353-8040
Fax: 312-353-8120
Email:Office.Chicago@trade.gov​

Megan Schildgen,Commercial Officer (Acting Director)
Phone: 312-353-4798
Email:megan.schildgen@trade.gov
Industries: General Consumer Goods, Environmental Technologies, Pollution Control Equipment and Water Resources Equipment & Services, Apparel, Textile Fabrics, Textile Machinery/Equipment and Textile Products-Made-Up

Marianne Drain,Commercial Officer
Phone: 312-353-7711
Email:marianne.drain@trade.gov
Industries: Agribusiness, Energy/Power, Food Processing, Packaging Equipment and Hotel/Restaurant Equipment

Christian Koschil,International Trade Specialist
Phone: 312-353-3749
Email:Christian.koschil@trade.gov
Industries: Biotechnology, Chemicals, Dental Equipment, Drugs/Pharmaceuticals, Health Care Services, Laboratory Scientific Instruments, Medical Equipment, Plastics and Veterinary Medicine Equipment/Supplies

Michael Marangell, International Trade Specialist
Phone: 312-353-5097
Email:michael.marangell@trade.gov
Industries: Aviation, Building Products & Tools, Construction Equipment, Forestry/Woodworking Machinery, Death Care, Electronics, Information Technology (Hardware & Software) and Telecommunications

Neil Pickett,Commercial Officer
Phone: 312-353-4453
Email:Neil.Pickett@trade.gov
Industries: General Industrial Equipment

Haley Pitonyak,International Trade Specialist (Trainee)
Phone: 312-353-5096
Email:Haley.Pitonyak@trade.gov
Industries: Cosmetics and Consumer Goods

Debra Rogers,Senior International Trade Specialist
Phone: 312-353-6988
Email:Debra.Rogers@trade.gov
Industries: Architectural/Construction/Engineering Services, Education/Training Services, Franchising, General Services, Oil/Gas & Renewable Energy (Wind and Solar Power) and Travel/Tourism Services

Vicki Tolefree,International Trade Specialist
Phone: 312-353-3748
Email:Vicki.Tolefree@trade.gov
Industries: Iron/Steel, Non-Ferrous Metals, Printing/Graphic Arts Equipment and Publishing

Monica Toporkiewicz,International Trade Specialist
Phone: 312-353-8059
Email:Monica.Toporkiewicz@trade.gov
Industries: Automotive Parts/Services Equipment, Railroad Equipment and Safety & Security Equipment


Export-Import Bank of the United States - Partner (Chicago)​

Michael Howard,Midwest Regional Director
Phone: 312-353-8093
Fax: 312-353-8098
Email:Michael.Howard@exim.gov

Barry Bint,Financial Management Analyst
Phone: 312-353-8071
Fax: 312-353-8089
Email:Barry.Bint@exim.gov

Jan Blaho,Financial Management Analyst
Phone: 312-353-8072
Fax: 312-353-8089
Email:Jan.Blaho@exim.gov

Marie Baldwin,Administrative Manager
Phone: 312-353-8081
Fax: 312-353-8098
Email:Marie.Baldwin@exim.gov


U.S. Small BusinessAdministration– Partner(Chicago)

John Nevell,Financial Management Analyst
Phone: 312-353-8065
Fax: 312-353-8098
Email:john.nevell@sba.gov


Peoria U.S. Export Assistance CenterContact Information

Jobst Hall, Rm. 141 View Staff
Bradley University
922 N. Glenwood
Peoria, IL 61606
Mailing Address:
1501 West Bradley Avenue
Peoria, IL 61625
Office.Peoria@trade.gov

Shari Stout,Senior International Trade Specialist
Phone: 309-671-7815
Fax: 309-671-7818
Email:Shari.Stout@trade.gov


Rockford U.S. Export Assistance CenterContact Information

at EIGERlab
605 Fulton Avenue, Suite E103
Rockford, IL 61103
Email:Office.Rockford@trade.gov

Patrick Hope,Senior International Trade Specialist
Phone: 815-316-2380
Email:Patrick.Hope@trade.gov
Industries: Aircraft/Aircraft Parts, Airport/Ground Support Eq., Automotive Parts/Services Eq., Aviation Services, Building Products, Construction Eq., Defense Industry Eq., Food Processing/Packaging Eq., Machine Tools/Metalworking Eq., Medical Eq., Packaging Eq., Pollution Control Eq., Pumps/Valves/Compressors, Telecommunications Eq., Tools - Hand/Power, Water Resources Eq./


L​​​ibertyville U.S. Export Assistance Center (Vacant)

28055 Ashley Circle
Suite 212
Libertyville, IL 60048


Trade Information Center​

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.

​
